name: ARROW (itch) (Lucars)
description:
!This is an early prototype! ARROW - Bento

You are an astronaut of a spaceship    

and you have to steer it safely past 

the obstacles.

-------------------------

CONTROLS:

SPACE:   Change direction / Start the game
